column4: can you please suggest me a open-source software for ubuntu which use internet connection and we can can listen all radios from world. i see that there are sites like this : http://www.mikesradioworld.com/ which are supports million radios channel all over the world. i do not think that they use their own server.
consider shortwave radios or a computer that can use SDR (software defined radios)
also, http://classic.shoutcast.com has a great selection
Dr_Willis:  you give me just a site :( i can find every radios from my browsers. but it is not comfortable like a software for my desktop :( but thanks for helping.. :)
